EDITORLINKDIALOG.HEADER: Link Description and URL Input Modal
EDITORLINKDIALOG.DESCRIPTION: Please enter the link description and URL for the selected text.

LoginDialogContainer.DialogDescription: Please select your preferred login method

LoginForm.share_comparison: Share lookalike comparisons with each other

MAINPAGE.TITLE: Start Your Look-Alike Comparison
MAINPAGE.DESCRIPTION-1: Update a photo for look-alike comparison and proceed with the comparison.
MAINPAGE.DESCRIPTION-2: You can check who you resemble more.
MAINPAGE.title: Simmey - Discover how much you resemble your mom and dad using our face-matching AI!
MAINPAGE.description: Use our face-matching AI to see how much you resemble your parents! This is the main page where you can start a fun and exciting family look-alike comparison.
MAINPAGE.keywords: face comparison, parents, similarity, fun, family

ADD.PICTURE-FAIL-DESC: Failed to add a new picture.

COMPARE.ERROR-USER-NOT-SELECTED: Please select yourself as a comparison target.
COMPARE.ERROR-MIN-TWO-PLAYERS: Please select at least two comparison targets.
COMPARE.ERROR-FACE-NOT-RECOGNIZED: There is a photo where the face is not recognized.

FACES.TUTORIAL-STEP-1: Please add the photos you want to compare.
FACES.TUTORIAL-STEP-2: You can extract and check only faces from the photos!
FACES.TUTORIAL-STEP-3: Select yourself as required and classify at least one comparison target.
FACES.TUTORIAL-STEP-4: You can manually recrop or delete images!
FACES.TUTORIAL-STEP-5: Once selection is complete, press the button!
FACES.description: This is a face matching homepage where you can upload photos to extract and compare faces. Select yourself and at least one other person to easily compare faces.
FACES.keywords: Face matching, face comparison, photo upload, face extraction, image crop, face recognition, photo comparison

IMAGES.ImageUpload-info: *Image information is not stored on the server until it is shared!
IMAGES.DIALOG-SUCCESS-DESCRIPTION: The classification item was successfully added.
IMAGES.CROP-DIALOG-SELECT-AREA: Please select the area to crop
IMAGES.CROP-DIALOG-INSTRUCTIONS-1: Please redefine the crop area from the original photo.
IMAGES.CROP-DIALOG-INSTRUCTIONS-2: Adjust the blue area to specify the crop region.
IMAGES.RemoveImageDialog-description: Are you sure you want to delete the comparison photo?

RemoveTemplateDialog.warning: Once deleted, this action cannot be undone.

LoginPopupPage.login_completed: Login is complete. Please close this window and try again.

UpdateHistoryTitleDialog.success_description: The title has been successfully updated.

RemoveCommentDialog.dialog_description: Are you sure you want to delete this result?

RemoveCommentDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete this result?

LOGIN.title: Simmey - Discover how much you resemble your mom and dad using our face-matching AI!
LOGIN.description: Quickly access desired features with a secure and simple login system.
LOGIN.keywords: Login, account access, secure login, easy login, authentication
